name: OR_LNLG_WARMDEVS
description: This table contains the Warming Devices information for the Surgical Log (ORL).

columns.name: RECORD_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the line record.

columns.name: WARMING_DEVICE_ID
columns.description: The ID of the warming device.

columns.name: WARM_DEVICE_TYPE_C_NAME
columns.description: The type of the warming device.

columns.name: WARMING_TEMPERATUR
columns.description: The temperature of the warming device.

columns.name: WARMING_SETTING_C_NAME
columns.description: The setting of the warming device.
